description: A version is a numbered snapshot of your work that you can publish for use in different parts of your workflow, such as development, beta deployment, and production.

Id.markdownDescription:
Unique ID of resource

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 10  
Maximum Length: 10  
Pattern: ^[0-9a-zA-Z]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: A description of the version. Use the description to help identify the version in lists.
Description.markdownDescription:
A description of the version. Use the description to help identify the version in lists.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 200  
Update requires: No interruption

LocaleId.description: The identifier of the language and locale that the bot will be used in.
LocaleId.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the language and locale that the bot will be used in.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

BotVersion.markdownDescription:
The version of a bot.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 5  
Pattern: ^(DRAFT|[0-9]+)$  
Update requires: No interruption

BotVersionLocaleDetails.description: The version of a bot used for a bot locale.
BotVersionLocaleDetails.markdownDescription:
The version of a bot used for a bot locale.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

BotVersionLocaleSpecification.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

BotVersionLocaleSpecificationList.description: Specifies the locales that Amazon Lex adds to this version. You can choose the Draft version or any other previously published version for each locale.
BotVersionLocaleSpecificationList.markdownDescription:
Specifies the locales that Amazon Lex adds to this version. You can choose the Draft version or any other previously published version for each locale.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption
